Record.ClassificationPath: Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Pathologic Processes/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Cardiac Complexes, Premature
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Cardiac Complexes, Premature
Record.Description: A group of cardiac arrhythmias in which the cardiac contractions are not initiated at the SINOATRIAL NODE. They include both atrial and ventricular premature beats, and are also known as extra or ectopic heartbeats. Their frequency is increased in heart diseases.
